ClassRegistry

Source: R/class_registry.R
ClassRegistry.Rd

Base schema class with which to define custom schemas

Public fields

registry

(list) list of classes registered

Methods

Public methods

  • ClassRegistry$print()

  • ClassRegistry$register()

  • ClassRegistry$get_class()

  • ClassRegistry$clone()

Method print()

Usage

ClassRegistry$print(x)

Method register()

Add a class to the registry of serializer classes

Usage

ClassRegistry$register(class_name, cls)

Arguments

class_name

(character) the class name

cls

(Schema) the class object

Returns

nothing, registers internally

Method get_class()

Usage

ClassRegistry$get_class(class_name)

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

ClassRegistry$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.

Examples

x <- ClassRegistry$new()
x

#> class registry
#>   registry (n): 0
#>   names (first 10): 
x$registry

#> list()
z <- Schema$new("FooBar",
  name = fields$character(),
  title = fields$character()
)
w <- Schema$new("MySchema",
  name = fields$character(),
  title = fields$character()
)
x

#> class registry
#>   registry (n): 0
#>   names (first 10): 
x$registry

#> list()
x$register("FooBar", z)
x$register("MySchema", w)
x

#> class registry
#>   registry (n): 2
#>   names (first 10): FooBar,MySchema
x$registry

#> $FooBar
#> <schema: FooBar>
#> fields: name, title
#> 
#> $MySchema
#> <schema: MySchema>
#> fields: name, title
#> 

x$get_class("FooBar")

#> <schema: FooBar>
#> fields: name, title
x$get_class("MySchema")

#> <schema: MySchema>
#> fields: name, title
